translations.translation: I will force him to climb a fiery slope.
I shall inflict on him hardship,
I shall soon constrain him to a hard ascent.
We shall make him suffer the torment of hell without relief.
Soon I shall mount him on Saood, the hill of fire.
I shall force him to Sa`ud!
I will make a distressing punishment overtake him.
and I shall constrain him to a hard ascent.
On him I shall impose a fearful doom.
I shall force him to endure a painful uphill climb!
Anon I shall afflict him with a fearful woe.
Soon I will overwhelm him with hardship.
Soon will I visit him with a mount of calamities!
I shall oblige him to (climb a slippery mountain in the Hell-fire called As-Sa'ud, or to) face a severe torment!
I will constrain him to a hard ascent.
I will cover him with arduous torment.
[74:17] [Soon] I shall burden him with a trying chastisement; alternatively [sa‘ūdan means] a mountain of fire which he will be made to ascend and then fall down from, forever.

(On him I shall impose a fearful doom) I shall make him climb a smooth rock in the Fire such that whenever he puts his hands on it, he wwould melt, and then he will be restored to how he used to be; it is also said that Allah will make him climb a rock of copper which pulls him from the front and hits him from the back.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { سَأُرْهِقُهُ } معناه سَاغشيهِ { صَعُوداً } معناه مَشقةٌ من العَذابِ
 قال الإِمامُ زيد بن علي عليهما السّلامُ صَعودٌ: عَقبةٌ مَلساءٌ في النِّارِ إذَا وَضَعَ أَحدُهُم يَدهُ عليها ذَابَتْ يَدُهُ
 وإذا رَفَعَها عَادَتْ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وبالجملة: { سَأُرْهِقُهُ } أي: سأغشيه وأكلفه بالعنف في النشأة الأخرى { صَعُوداً } [المدثر: 17] عقبة شاقة المصعد والمهوى، فأكلفه على الصعود والهبوط دائماً، بحيث لا نجاة منها، وعنه صلى الله عليه وسلم:

 " الصعود جبل من نار يصعد فيه سبعين خريفاً، ثمَّ يهوى فيه كذلك أبداً " 

، وهو مثل لما يلقى من الشدائد
